name: PLAYER_MAX_STAMINA
info: Sets max stamina value of the player.

name: PLAYER_HUNGER_RATE
info: Set base hunger rate per 5 minutes. Default: 1.0

name: PLAYER_THIRST_RATE
info: Set base thirst rate per 5 minutes. Default: 1.0

name: PLAYER_FATIGUE_RATE
info: Set base fatigue rate per 5 minutes. Default: 1.0

name: PLAYER_HEALING_RATE
info: Set base player healing rate per turn. Default: 0.01

name: NPC_HEALING_RATE
info: Set base NPC healing rate per turn. Default: 0.01

name: PLAYER_MAX_STAMINA_PENALTY
info: How many used stamina points required to reduce stamina pool size by 1.  Default: 100

name: PLAYER_MAX_STAMINA_REGENERATE
info: Stamina pool regenerating rate per turn while sleeping.  Default: 0.2

name: PLAYER_RECOVER_STAMINA_INCREASE_HUNGER
info: How much hunger will be added for recovering 1000 stamina.  Default: 10

name: PLAYER_RECOVER_STAMINA_INCREASE_THRIST
info: How much thrist will be added for recovering 1000 stamina.  Default: 10

name: PLAYER_RECOVER_STAMINA_INCREASE_FATIGUE
info: How much fatigue will be added for recovering 1000 stamina.  Default: 10
